evidence.claim: Orb Health utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure, enhancing scalability and reliability.
The platform supports FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Use of HL7 protocols for secure health data exchanges.
Implementation of X12 EDI for billing and insurance transactions within their health tech solutions.
The integration patterns include REST APIs and Webhooks, facilitating easy data sharing between systems.

icp.icp_reason: Involved with X12 and EDI transactions, indicating strong potential for API-first integration.
